name: Dino Dude
description:
If you have any suggestions please comment them. CONTROLS:
  • WASD - Movement
  • E - Interact
  • Space - Attack
Future updates will have:
  • Health
  • Multiplayer
  • Randomly generated levels
  • NPCs
  • Dash move
  • New enemies and weapons
  • Easter eggs
  • Music
  • And more!
